body:
Hum!! In PowerShell Core, I'm know about the [ordered] type and found out that it will keep the order of my variable splatting in the hash table.

So, is this correct??  Is this the new way now?

```
PS /home/maxt> $Params1 = @{                                                                                                        >> ResourceGroupName = 'GlobalAzureBootCampResources'                                                                               >> Name = 'glbazbootcampstoreast01'                                                                                                 >> Location = 'EastUS'                                                                                                              >> SkuName = 'Standard_GRS'                                                                                                         >> };                                                                                                                               
PS /home/maxt> 
PS /home/maxt> $Params1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Name                           Value                                                                                                ----                           -----                                                                                                Location                       EastUS                                                                                               SkuName                        Standard_GRS                                                                                         
Name                           glbazbootcampstoreast01
ResourceGroupName              GlobalAzureBootCampResources


PS /home/maxt> 
PS /home/maxt> $Params1 = [ordered] @{                                                                                              >> ResourceGroupName = 'GlobalAzureBootCampResources'                                                                               >> Name = 'glbazbootcampstoreast01'                                                                                                 >> Location = 'EastUS'                                                                                                              >> SkuName = 'Standard_GRS'                                                                                                         >> };                                                                                                                               
PS /home/maxt> 
PS /home/maxt> $Params1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Name                           Value                                                                                                ----                           -----                                                                                                ResourceGroupName              GlobalAzureBootCampResources                                                                         Name                           glbazbootcampstoreast01                                                                              
Location                       EastUS
SkuName                        Standard_GRS


PS /home/maxt> 
```
![variable_splatting_03_2018-04-19_19-03-32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/39022983-1b709596-4406-11e8-95a8-5e26b1fdec50.jpg)

Ah! Let me look into this deeper..  I think I got something else here. Let me get back to this in a little bit.
I need to run and get something from the store.

I was going in circles... I caught myself applying the wrong technique. I was using the $Param1 instead of @Param1 in the Cmdlet.

So, I'm going to close this issue because the variable splatting work in PSCore.

:)

![variable_splatting_04_2018-04-19_19-03-32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19892435/39024783-11dbda58-4411-11e8-9670-b271980e7f0d.jpg)
